jodd.lagarto.dom

Class NodeSelector

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.lagarto.dom.NodeSelector

  • public class NodeSelector
extends java.lang.Object
    Node selector selects DOM nodes using CSS3 selectors. Group of queries are supported.
